key.name: time-left
key.description: The remaining time for the current timer session.

key.name: work-cycle-count
key.description: How many work cycles have been completed towards a long break.

key.name: session-type
key.description: The type of the current session (e.g., Work, Short Break).

key.name: quit-time
key.summary: The timestamp of the last save
key.description: The monotonic time when the extension was last disabled. This is used to calculate elapsed time.

key.name: cycles-today
key.description: The total number of work cycles completed on the current day.

key.name: last-cycle-date
key.summary: Date of the last cycle count
key.description: The date (YYYY-MM-DD) corresponding to the 'cycles-today' count. Used to reset the count daily.
